Title: 41723 - How to: Styling Your New Home
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 tips for someone who is planning on styling a new home. You should discuss how moving into a new home gives you the freedom to create a totally unique space, and give advice on how to decide the décor style you want to go with. You should give tips for choosing color schemes, furniture, wall art, bedding, etc. Be sure to mention that if you’re moving to a new city, it’s important to decorate your new home in a way that feels comfortable, so that the adjustment to a new location is easier. You can incorporate your client URL in this section, by mentioning moving to a new home in a city like Phoenix, Arizona. Make sure the piece is written towards people looking to buy a new home, rather than people who have already purchased a new home. Your target audience is interested in interior design, so write with this in mind.

Title: 41724 - # Reasons to Buy a New House Later in Life
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 reasons that someone would want to buy a new house later in life. The placement site for this article will be a site for baby boomers (aged 52-70+), so write with this audience in mind. You should discuss the benefits of downsizing from a larger home, or starting over in a later stage of life. You can talk about the excitement of redecorating, moving to a new neighborhood, and getting rid of old clutter from the past while packing. You can include the target URL in any section that mentions purchasing a new home.
